    The Manufacturing AI Research Center was newly established on January 1, 2024, as a direct organization under the Vice President of the Korea Institute of Industrial Technology. It aims to concentrate capabilities on developing an AI platform for the "AI-based innovation in manufacturing" initiative, promoting the rapid dissemination of the developed platform, and fostering in-house AI experts.

    Contact Info

    The Manufacturing AI Research Center was newly established on January 1, 2024, as a direct organization under the Vice President of the Korea Institute of Industrial Technology. It aims to concentrate capabilities on developing an AI platform for the "AI-based innovation in manufacturing" initiative, promoting the rapid dissemination of the developed platform, and fostering in-house AI experts.
